overview.en: MGP is a distributed game ecosystem platform based on block chain technology. With a decentralized structure, it directly links the constituent molecules in the whole game ecological chain to realize the direct docking, lossless circulation and safe storage of individual value.
overview.zh: MGP是基于区块链技术打造的分布式游戏生态平台。它以去中心化的结构，直接将整个游戏生态链上的组成分子有机地链接起来，实现个体价值的直接对接、无损流通和安全存储。
